entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
